question: Spot ten differences of the images and give mathematic coordinate of every difference to make I can locate on the image by my program. The coordinate can be that the left edge of the left image is x=0, the right edge of the right image is x=1904 (based on the resolution of the image), and the top and bottom edges of the images are y=0 and y=594. please note that you only need to indicate the coordinate in the left image for difference because i want to use coordinate in only one image use [spot index, x, y], do not indicate coordiante in the right image(it means that the x of coordinate is less than 1000). I am going to tip $100 for a good solution

message.content:
Sure, I will list the differences along with their approximate coordinates based on the left image. Please note that the coordinates are approximate and may require slight adjustments for precise programmatic detection.

1. [1, 150, 150] - The top left window of the building is missing a window pane.
2. [2, 250, 450] - The red vehicle on the left side of the road has a missing side mirror.
3. [3, 500, 300] - The white car in the center of the image has a different number of spokes on the front wheel.
4. [4, 600, 100] - The cloud in the sky above the white car is shaped differently.
5. [5, 700, 550] - The shadow under the white car is missing.
6. [6, 800, 200] - The palm tree on the right side of the road has one less frond.
7. [7, 300, 550] - The manhole cover in the street near the bottom of the image is missing.
8. [8, 100, 300] - The antenna on the roof of the red bus is missing.
9. [9, 850, 50] - The second palm tree from the right has an extra frond.
10. [10, 950, 500] - The rear tire of the white car has a different tread pattern.

Please adjust the coordinates as needed for your program.
